source.name: Dangerous Buildings Scored
source.description: As of late 2010, all open Dangerous Building cases are scored by inspectors according to several objective criteria, including age of the case, severity of the damage to the structure, proximity to parks, schools, and major streets, and likelihood of being repaired.  If you have questions about the score for a particular case, please contact the inspector responsible for monitoring the case, by calling 816-513-8430.
